EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Information (1330094839.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Information (1330094839.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - 1024x768 - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Jeff, In order to create an estimate that would be accurate to your situation I will need to know a few pieces of information. First, in regards to you asking for taxes being deducted for a 100k employee, I can work backwards to find a 1099 bill rate that would get you to approx 100k AGI (W2) but I wasn’t sure if you already had a specific bill rate in mind. Also, I will need to know: 1. Do you file as married or single2. How many withholding allowances do you take (deducted from your paycheck)3. Will you be living and working in NJ4. Approx how many hours do you anticipate working a month. I have created an estimate that I attached above without knowing some of this information and I just assumed that you file as single, 0, are working 160 hours a month and you live/work in NJ. The bill rate you would have to have negotiated with your client for your gross W2 annually to be around 100k (if you worked 160 hours per month for 12 months, we don’t offer a “salary”) would need to be approx $61/hr (this includes our fee being deducted). I included an estimate with and without expenses so you can see how entering about $400/month in operating expenses would help to lower your taxes and increase your take home. If you look at the box labeled “Business Center Payroll Tax Breakdown” to the right of the estimate (second box down) it lists all of the taxes you would be responsible for that are included in your business center payroll taxes, including state unemployment. The estimate has three columns and what they reflect is: -The first shows the first month you would be working with us, and your taxes will be a bit higher because you haven’t hit the caps on any of the business center payroll taxes-The second shows a later month in the year once you have hit some of those tax caps and your taxes would go down.-The third column shows an annualized amount assuming you worked 12 months at $61/hr, for 160 hours per month. I would be happy to run additional estimates for you if you define the hourly rate, number of hours and your personal withholding situation. These estimates will show you a worst case scenario in terms of taxes because the single,0 will have the most amount withheld. Please let me know if you have any additional questions. Thank you,Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: <bbentley@mbopartners.com">ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailAutoSig> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Jeff Roush [mailto:jeff_roush@hotmail.com] Sent: Friday, February 24, 2012 8:49 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: RE: MBO Partners Information Nicolette, In addition to the payroll breakdown example, can you let me know what my typical unemployment contribution would be for NJ? Thanks!JeffFrom: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com> To: jeff_roush@hotmail.com <mailto:jeff_roush@hotmail.com> Date: Thu, 23 Feb 2012 15:04:30 -0500 Subject: RE: MBO Partners InformationHi Jeff, We do not offer a lower fee for people who do not need benefits because the cost of benefits is separate from the services we provide. The benefits are all a la carte so you get to choose which you use if any and if you choose to elect any of them you would pay the monthly premium for those insurances. Please let me know if you have any additional questions. Thank you and have a great day,Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: mailto:jeff_roush@hotmail.com <http://bbentley%40mbopartners.com" target="_blank">ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Jeff Roush [<a href="mailto:jeff_roush@hotmail.com>] Sent: Thursday, February 23, 2012 1:07 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: RE: MBO Partners Information Nicolette, I don't need healthcare. Do you offer a lower % fee for people who don't need this service? JeffFrom: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com> To: jeff_roush@hotmail.com <mailto:jeff_roush@hotmail.com> Date: Thu, 23 Feb 2012 12:39:41 -0500 Subject: MBO Partners Information Hi Jeff, It was a pleasure speaking with you today. I’ve enclosed a few resources that you might find helpful as discussed: - We have created an index of past webinars on topics specifically catered for independent consultants. You can view our index by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs3hk5OmKKonlkCHNe5Gk9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D" target="_blank>.
- In addition we have a 2012 Webinar track that will cover everything to do with working independently. We have three tracks, you can sign up to receive notifications when new webinars are scheduled by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/Webinar.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs3hk5OmKKonlkCHNe5Gk9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D" target="_blank>.
- Lastly, you can view all the information we spoke over the phone by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-n-taylor.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs3hk5OmKKonlkCHNe5Gk9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D" target="_blank>. If you have questions for me, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you using my postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs3hk5OmKKonlkCHNe5Gk9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D" target="_blank">online schedule. I look forward to speaking with you again soon! Thank you, Nicolette___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
